'''''Elizabethan Acting''''' is volume two in the ''Oxford English Monographs'' series. [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] was one of the General Editors for the series. In the introduction, editor B.L. Joseph thanks Tolkien for his "comment and encouragement".<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=95150|articlename=Elizabethan Acting. 1951|dated=|website=TB|accessed=21 June 2012}}</ref>
